summary.overview: The user expressed significant worry about their financial situation and inquired about government assistance for farmers. The AI attempted to offer support but the conversation was cut short.

conversation.speaker: ai
conversation.text: Namaskar Bhaiya, hum Sunita Devi bolat hain, Rajesh Verma ji ke taraf se. Kaise hain aap? Hum aapke chinta ke baare mein jaanana chahat hain, aapke yahan sabse badi samasya ka baa?

conversation.speaker: user
conversation.text: चिंता तो काफी है। आप यह बताइए कि राजीव जी हम लोगों किसानों के लिए क्या कर रहे हैं? हम बड़ी ही दिक्कत में हैं।

conversation.speaker: ai
conversation.text: Hum aapke dikkat ke baare mein

conversation.speaker: ai
conversation.text: samajh sakte hain, Bhaiya. Aap kisan hain ka? Hum sunat
